title: Spotify Car Thing update adds the ability to control other media apps, answer phone calls
content:
While Spotify’s Car Thing device isn’t exactly pointless, it certainly has a narrow use case as we detailed in our recent review. Now, Spotify Car Thing is picking up its first major update with the ability to answer phone calls, control other apps, and more.

more…

The post Spotify Car Thing update adds the ability to control other media apps, answer phone calls appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: To add on to its limited functionality, Spotify Car Thing is getting a new update that adds phone call support and more.
